pages.text: Cheloniellon was a small flat bodied arthropod from the lower Devonian period. It had an exoskeleton that comprised of 11 segments and had laterally expanded appendages underneath the exoskeleton segments.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
